title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 330-2.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 330-2.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the main office of the agency, which is located at: Tower

Building, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12242. (b) Whenever practicable, records shall be
made available at a regional office most convenient to a data
subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
330-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
